alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 31 at 3:53AM MST until February 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible. * WHERE...Lamar Vicinity/Prowers County and Springfield Vicinity/Baca County Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
